definition: to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)

sentences.english: Project and runs which by the count-down result heel-to-toe walking race, calls " Track athletics " .
sentences.chinese: 以时间计算成绩的竞走和跑的项目，叫“径赛”。

sentences.english: To help reach it, I take at least one walk during daylight hours.
sentences.chinese: 为了达到目标，我白天的时候至少会竞走一次。

sentences.english: A:I think maybe one day you can take part in the walking race.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得你有朝一日可以参加竞走比赛。

sentences.english: A school sports, I participated in the women's 400-meter relay.
sentences.chinese: 一次黉舍活动会上，我加入了女子400米接力竞走。

sentences.english: The walkers soldiered on although the weather was terrible.
sentences.chinese: 尽管天气恶劣，但竞走运动员还是勇敢地继续前行。

sentences.english: He has stepped up his training to prepare for the race.
sentences.chinese: 他为筹备那场竞走增强了练习。

sentences.english: I think maybe one day you can take part in the walking race.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得你有朝一日可以参加竞走比赛。

sentences.english: Some examples of individual sports are swimming, running, and walking races.
sentences.chinese: 个人赛的例子是游泳，跑步，竞走。

sentences.english: Improving pace frequency is the main factor in raising the results of speed walking.
sentences.chinese: 发展步频是提高竞走运动成绩的主要因素。

sentences.english: It's a foot race, who can out-hustle who?
sentences.chinese: 它的竞走比赛，谁可以出喧嚣谁？

sentences.english: We've heard you have some very good race-walkers in your delegation.
sentences.chinese: 听说你们代表团中有几位非常优秀的竞走运动员。

sentences.english: Finally, analyze Yunnan province the man's heel-and-toe walking sport actual circumstance in member of team.
sentences.chinese: 最后，分析云南省男子竞走队员实际情况。

definition: to run/to jog/(military) to march at the double
